name: Roma Holdings, Inc.
description: Roma Holdings, Inc. is a leading company in the real estate and property management sector, specializing in luxury residential and commercial properties. Founded in 2010, Roma Holdings has rapidly established itself as a trusted name in the real estate market, focusing on high-end developments and exceptional customer service. With a portfolio that includes stunning residences, mixed-use developments, and commercial spaces, Roma Holdings is committed to creating value through innovative design and sustainable practices. The company prioritizes quality construction and aesthetic appeal, ensuring that each project reflects the highest standards of excellence. By leveraging cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights, Roma Holdings optimizes property management processes and enhances the overall tenant experience. The firm is also dedicated to community engagement and environmental sustainability, actively participating in initiatives that promote green building practices and social responsibility. With a vision to redefine urban living, Roma Holdings continues to expand its footprint in key metropolitan areas, aiming to deliver unparalleled living and working experiences.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Roma Holdings, Inc. | Luxury Real Estate and Property Management
seo.meta_description: Explore Roma Holdings, Inc., a leader in luxury real estate and property management. Discover our innovative projects and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Roma Holdings specialize in?
faq.answer: Roma Holdings specializes in luxury residential and commercial properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Roma Holdings?
faq.answer: Sophia Rossi is the CEO of Roma Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Roma Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: Roma Holdings is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Roma Holdings manage?
faq.answer: Roma Holdings manages luxury apartments, single-family homes, office spaces, and retail centers.
